body:
I believe the latest run of `goreleaser` failed for the `1.22.3` release:
https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/actions/runs/7134421678

It would be awesome to get it working again.
Thanks already.

/cc @rodrigozhou

comments.body:
Hm. I think I forgot to cherry pick the fix from the main branch.
However, do you mind sharing why you need the binaries?
We have the [Temporal CLI](https://github.com/temporalio/cli) and also [Docker images](https://github.com/temporalio/docker-compose) to run Temporal Server.
Also, we're planing to remove these binaries going forwards anyway.

For our use-case we're building a custom Docker image and download the binaries from the GitHub release.
We need to base on some internal image because of compliance/security reasons.
It was just very handy to download the binaries from the GitHub release instead of building them our own.

I'll try to adapt our Dockerfile to copy it from the official Docker image instead.

Think this issue can be closed. Thanks for having a look.
@danieljoos We just release v1.22.4 which included the binaries.

title: Binaries for `1.22.3` missing in release
